about_the_game:
DLC Bundle Rare Weapons Set C contains the following items:

A set of hard to get weapons in one bundle. Includes Dojima's Shady Deal, Melinda's Chieftain, Madara's Two Heart and Onigawara's Tiger Claw and Dragon Claw. With this set, these weapons are purchasable from the specter in the cemetery.
